items.title: Parity 1.6
items.markdown:
Packed with more features than ever before, the Parity 1.6 release is something we are immensely proud of. It introduces support for account vaults, Stratum for mining, hardware wallets, an enhanced contract wallet, a new homepage and a host of other features, both from stability and usability perspectives.

To get an overview of everything included, read the [release accouncement](https://blog.ethcore.io/) on our blog.

items.title: Questions?
items.markdown:
Have questions? We would like to get them answered. The [Parity wiki](https://github.com/ethcore/parity/wiki) should be the first stop for any general questions in running the software, configuring it or just trying out some of the basic or advanced features of Parity, either as a user, developer or miner.

If you prefer direct interaction with the team, join us on our [gitter channel](https://gitter.im/ethcore/parity) and feel free to ask any questions.
